input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
Barbie Fashion Night Looks - Pink and Black Cheetah by Mattel

Product features:
Each includes 2 fashions and trend-topping accessories
On-trend accessories include 2 amazing pairs of shoes (in different colors), statement pieces, and a handbag
Mix and match with other friends, fashions, and accessories (sold separately)
Dolls not included.
input_text.Response A: Now this is a statement! Barbie Fashion Night Looks - Pink and Black Cheetah by Mattel is the ultimate style for those nights out on the town with your girlfriends! With on-trend accessories that include 2 amazing pairs of shoes, a handbag and statement jewelry, you'll be ready to hit the town in style! Mix and match these fashions with other Barbie Fashion friends and fashions (sold separately) to create your own unique look. Dolls not included.
input_text.Response B:
Please write a fun product description
Fashionable and fierce, this Barbie Fashion Night Looks - Pink and Black Cheetah by Mattel is the perfect addition to your Barbie collection. With two stylish and trend-setting outfits, you can mix and match accessories for endless fun. The pink and black cheetah print dress is sure to turn heads while the black jumpsuit with pink detailing is perfect for a night out. Each set includes shoes, a statement piece, and a handbag. Mix and match with other friends and accessories (sold separately) for even more fun! Product does not include dolls.
